name: digiblocks
description: A collection of beautiful custom Gutenberg blocks for WordPress.

scripts.clean: rm -rf assets/css/admin/* assets/js/admin/* assets/js/blocks/* assets/js/globals.js assets/css/animations/*
scripts.build:css-animations: mkdir -p assets/css/animations && for file in ./resources/css/animations/*.css; do cleancss -o "./assets/css/animations/$(basename "$file")" "$file"; done
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run clean:ds_store && npm run dev:css-animations && npm run dev:css-admin & npm run dev:css-review-notice & npm run dev:css-blocks & npm run dev:js-admin & npm run dev:js-globals & npm run dev:js-blocks & npm run dev:js-animations & npm run dev:js-lottie
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run clean:ds_store && npm run build:css-animations && npm run build:css-admin && npm run build:css-review-notice && npm run build:css-blocks && npm run build:js-admin && npm run build:js-globals && npm run build:js-blocks && npm run build:js-animations && npm run build:js-lottie
scripts.pack: npm run build && find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && zip -r digiblocks.zip . -x '*node_modules*' -x '*/node_modules/*' -x '*/.*' -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*__MACOSX*' -x 'generate-blocks-index.js' -x 'generate-icons.js' -x 'package.json' -x 'package-lock.json' -x 'postcss.config.js' -x 'prettier.config.js' -x 'composer.json' -x 'composer.lock' -x '.prettierignore' -x 'CONTRIBUTING.md' -x 'README.md' -x '.gitattributes' -x '.gitignore' -x 'phpcs.xml' -x '.git/*' -x '.git/**/*'
